INVITE_BOT_URL: [Click here to invite the bot to your server!]({url})
NO_SUBCOMMAND:
:warning: You didn't specify any subcommand.
:information_source: Learn more: ``{help}``
CONFIG_PREFIX_HELP: Changes bot's prefix in the server
CONFIG_PREFIX_UPDATED: :ok_hand: Server's prefix has been updated to ``{prefix}``
CONFIG_UPDATE_ERROR: :x: It looks like something went wrong. Please, contact bot developer to fix this issue.
CONFIG_TIMEZONE_HELP: Changes timezone for logs and other bot functionality that involves time
CONFIG_TIMEZONE_UPDATED: :ok_hand: Server's timezone has been updated to ``{timezone}``
CONFIG_LANGUAGE_BAD_LANGUAGE: You can only use these languages: {languages}
CONTENT_LENGTH_90_MAX: :x: Text length must be 90 characters or less!
HELP_ENDING_NOTE: Use {prefix}help [command] to learn more about the command or module.
FOX_HELP: Sends random fox in a chat
CAT_HELP: Sends random cat in a chat
COMPARE_HELP:
Compares things
To include a phrase wrap it with double quotes: "two words"
YESNO_HELP: Answers with a yes or no
FLIPS_NUM_MUST_BE_INT: The number of flips must be an integer number type!
FLIPS_MAX_NUM: The number of flips can't be higher than `1000`!
RATE_TITLE: The Best Opinion of the Universe
TODO_MISSING_ARG: :warning: You didn't specify what you want to do!
TODO_MUST_BE_INT: :warning: Todo ID must be an integer number!
TODO_ADD_HELP: Creates a new entry in your todo list
TODO_REMOVE_HELP: Deletes an entry from your todo list
TODO_PURGE_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to purge your todo list?
Type `yes` to confirm it, `no` to abort.
TODO_PURGE_DONE: :ok_hand: Your todo list has been purged!
TODO_PURGE_EMPTY_LIST: :x: Your todo list is already empty.
SERVERINFO_HELP: Shows general information about discord server
SERVERINFO_ONLY_INT_IDS: :warning: Server ID has to be an integer number!
SERVERINFO_NOT_FOUND: :x: Server with ID ``{id}`` was not found.
ERROR_HANDLER_UNEXPECTED:
:x: An unexpected error has occurred! 
:incoming_envelope: Bot developer received a notification about this.
ERROR_HANDLER_MISSING_ARG:
Required command argument is missing.
Syntax: ``{syntax}``
ERROR_HANDLER_ON_COOLDOWN_WAIT: Please, wait **{wait_more}** seconds before running this command.
ERROR_HANDLER_USERINFO_INVALID_ARG: You have provided an invalid User ID
ERROR_HANDLER_SERVERINFO_INVALID_ARG: You have provided an invalid Server ID
ERROR_HANDLER_BOT_MISSING_PERMS: :x: I don't have enough permissions to do this.
ERROR_HANDLER_SERVER_ONLY: :x: {command} can only be used on a server.
DAYS_AGO: {days, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
HUG_HELP: Give a hug to someone in the server!
HUG_MESSAGE_1: {target}, **{author}** just gave you a big-big hug!
BINARY_HELP: Converts your input to binary and vise versa.
WHO_HELP: Small game where you have to guess the server member name by their avatar in 10 seconds
WHO_TITLE: Guess who this is! You have 10 seconds!
WHO_CORRECT_ANSWER_WAS: Looks like nobody managed to guess that it was ``{user}``.
AVATARCOLORS_HELP: Shows 5 most used colors of someone's avatar
REACTIONTEST_DESCRIPTION: First person who reacts with {emoji} wins!
REACTIONTEST_PREPARE: Prepare yourself! We're starting in 3 seconds!
CONFIG_MOD_ROLES_ADDED: Added roles to Moderator roles list
CONFIG_MOD_ROLES_REMOVED: Removed roles from Moderator roles list
MOD_ROLES_ADD_HELP: Add new role to Moderator roles list
MOD_ROLES_REMOVE_HELP: Remove a role from Moderator roles list
CONFIG_MOD_ROLES_EMPTY_ARGUMENT: :x: You have to specify at least one role or role ID!
CONFIG_MOD_ROLES_NONE_ADDED: :x: None of the provided roles were added!
EMPTY_INF_SEARCH: :warning: There are no infractions on the server!
ERROR_MAX_CONCURRENCY: :x: Too many people running this command!
ARCHIVE_SENT: :ok_hand: The message archive was sent into your DMs.
ARCHIVE_WARNING_CLOSED_DMS:
:warning: {author}, looks like your DMs are closed!
Would you like me to send the file here? Respond with a `yes` or `no`.
ARCHIVE_TOO_SLOW: :clock: You were too slow, the archiving process is cancelled.
ARCHIVE_CHANNEL_HELP: Archives X amount of latest messages in specific channel
TODO_EXPORT_HELP: Exports your todo list into `.txt` file and sends in your DMs
TODO_EXPORTED: :ok_hand: I've sent your todo list into your DMs!
TODO_EXPORT_CLOSED_DM: :x: {author}, your DMs are closed and I couldn't send you the file.
HELP_DESCRIPTION_1: To report a bug you can join the [Galleon Support Server](https://discord.gg/DhA3k6B).
HELP_DESCRIPTION_2: To get help you can join the [Galleon Support Server](https://discord.gg/DhA3k6B).
HELP_DESCRIPTION:
```
All the required arguments are wrapped with <argument>
All the optional arguments wrapped with [argument]
```[Support Server](https://discord.gg/DhA3k6B) | [Source Code](https://github.com/defracted/galleon)
